title: In the Chef’s Corner: Siphon Coffee Brewer | KitchenAid
description: “Secrets of Louisville Chefs” Host Tim Laird shows that home-brewed coffee can be easy to make using the KitchenAid siphon coffee brewer.

asset.author: KitchenAid
asset.hookText: “Secrets of Louisville Chefs” Host Tim Laird shows that home-brewed coffee can be easy to make using the KitchenAid siphon coffee brewer. For more information about KitchenAid coffee products, please visit: https://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/coffee-products/.

transcripts: Tim Laid in the chefs corner with KitchenAid. If you like a good cup of coffee like I do you're going to love this. It's KitchenAid's siphon coffee brewer. Designed to deliver a bright rich flavor like you get in the coffee shop. Making siphon brew coffee by hand is a complicated process requiring a open flame and frequent temperature adjustments. But with the KitchenAid siphon brewer you can do it with the convince of a home brewing system it works with vacuum technology that fully immerses the coffee grounds and water to create a more complex flavor profile. Have it straight or enhance it's high in flavor with the top shelf spirit. I like a little Kentucky bourbon in mind. I'm Tim Laid in the chef's corner with KitchenAid.
